captain.name: JJ Bumrah
captain.reason: Bumrah is likely to excel on this pitch and take crucial wickets. Considering the bowling-heavy strategy, making him captain is a strategic choice.

fantasy_team.name: JJ Bumrah
fantasy_team.reason: Bumrah is a premier bowler with a low economy and high wicket-taking ability. His consistent performance makes him a strong pick for the Wankhede pitch.

fantasy_team.name: Mustafizur Rahman
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced bowler with a proven track record of taking wickets. His variations can be effective on this pitch, and he's a good value pick at 6 credits.

fantasy_team.name: M Pathirana
fantasy_team.reason: Has impressed with his wicket-taking abilities and unique action. His low credit cost allows for better allocation of credits to other key players.

fantasy_team.name: S Dube
fantasy_team.reason: Dube provides both batting and bowling options.  His aggressive batting style suits the Wankhede pitch and he can contribute with crucial wickets.

fantasy_team.name: HH Pandya
fantasy_team.reason: Hardik Pandya is a key all-rounder for MI, capable of scoring quick runs and taking wickets. His experience and aggressive approach make him a valuable asset.

fantasy_team.name: R Ravindra
fantasy_team.reason: Ravindra offers a good balance of batting and bowling skills and is more of a batting allrounder and adds more value with Batting in the top order.

fantasy_team.name: AM Rahane
fantasy_team.reason: Rahane is an experienced batter with the ability to score runs consistently. His technique and temperament make him a reliable choice.

fantasy_team.name: RD Gaikwad
fantasy_team.reason: Gaikwad is a promising top-order batter with a good average. His ability to score quickly makes him a valuable asset, especially on a batting-friendly pitch.

fantasy_team.name: D Madushanka
fantasy_team.reason: Madushanka is picked for his potential to take wickets. He provides a valuable bowling option at a reasonable credit cost. His recent performances show promise.

fantasy_team.name: Ishan Kishan
fantasy_team.reason: Ishan Kishan is a dynamic wicketkeeper-batsman, known for his aggressive batting style. He adds value both behind the stumps and as a top-order hitter.

fantasy_team.name: MS Dhoni
fantasy_team.reason: Dhoni's experience and finishing abilities make him a valuable asset. His leadership and wicket-keeping skills further strengthen the team.

vice_captain.name: RD Gaikwad
vice_captain.reason: Gaikwad's consistent performances at the top of the order and high average make him a suitable candidate for vice-captain.
